amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce various accounts by $3,000,231,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the various accounts by $3,000,231,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 284 (Roll no. 633).
